backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing character profiles with access control and functions to save and retrieve profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing navigation between landing, customization, and game screens with audio and toasts.
frontend/src/audio/AudioProvider.tsx: Audio context managing background music, volume, mute state, persistence, and playback controls.
frontend/src/game/biomes/BiomeEnvironmen: R3F component configuring sky, fog, lights, and props for the active biome environment.
frontend/src/game/biomes/biomes.ts: Defines biome types and config objects for forest, desert, and mountains with lighting and color settings.
frontend/src/game/biomes/useBiomeStore.t: Zustand store managing the current biome and allowing biome changes.
frontend/src/game/combat/combatTypes.ts: Defines combat entities and functions for applying damage and healing.
React hook managing player health with damage and healing helpers.
frontend/src/game/controls/useFirstPerso: Implements first-person movement and rotation using keyboard, mouse, and collision‑bounded updates.
frontend/src/game/entities/HostileCreatu: React component for an enemy creature with movement AI, attack timing, animations, and a health bar.
frontend/src/game/entities/NPC.tsx: Renders an NPC that reacts to player proximity and triggers biome‑specific dialogue interactions.
frontend/src/game/entities/useCreatureAI: Provides simple AI for creatures, determining attack state and movement toward the player.
frontend/src/game/interactions/useIntera: Zustand store for interaction state, dialogue flow, and interaction availability.
frontend/src/game/physics/collision.ts: Utilities for AABB collision checks, clamping positions, and computing distances.
frontend/src/game/SpellheimCanvas.tsx: Main React Three Fiber game canvas containing physics, player controls, spells, AI creatures, NPCs, and biome environment.
frontend/src/game/spells/SpellEffects.ts: Renders projectile, area, and shield spell effects with animations and hit callbacks.
frontend/src/game/spells/spellTypes.ts: Defines available spells with metadata such as cost, cooldown, and keybinds.
Manages mana regen, spell casting, and cooldown timers with keyboard input handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's character profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom fantasy-themed color variables and component classes for panels, buttons, and headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/CharacterCustomizat: UI screen for editing a character's name, archetype, and cosmetic attributes, saving updates via state hooks.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the game canvas, HUD, and a modal for character customization with pointer lock tracking.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Landing page that displays the logo, description, controls, and start button for entering the game.
frontend/src/state/characterProfile.ts: Defines the CharacterProfile type, default values, and simple profile validation.
frontend/src/state/useCharacterProfile.t: Hook that loads, stores, and updates the character profile from local storage and optionally the backend.
frontend/src/ui/Auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and clears or refreshes queries on state changes.
frontend/src/ui/dialogue/DialoguePanel.t: Dialogue UI displaying current NPC text with next/close controls and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/AudioControls.tsx: Audio control UI with play/pause, mute, and volume slider tied to the audio provider.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/BiomeSwitcher.tsx: Dropdown UI for selecting and updating the current biome from available biome configurations.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/HUDOverlay.tsx: Main HUD container showing player status, spells, prompts, dialogue, settings, and profile info with pointer-lock messaging.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/InteractionPrompt.ts: Displays an on-screen prompt to press E when the player can interact and no dialogue is active.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/SpellBar.tsx: Renders equipped spells with icons, cooldown overlays, keybinds, and mana info.
frontend/src/ui/HUD/StatusBars.tsx: Shows health and mana bars with icons and numerical values using progress components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the game's project state, features, requirements, and image assets.
